trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Schaumburg
There were no other sightings in Schaumburg on or around May 9th 2011
divs: sighting detailsupon backing out of driveway and pulling away slowly going west, i noticed an object with 4 steady lights and 1 blinking light in the center hovering over local water retention area. it caught my eye because it was stationary for a while. i stopped my car in the middle of the street and watched it, thinking i should get my camera phone out and see if i can capture it. object began travelling east\southeast. movement was instantaneous, it did not pitch and accelerate like a helicopter, it just started moving at constant speed. i turned my car around and followed it to the end of the block to get a better look and object was gone. possibly misidentifed aircraft at odd angle, but highly unlikely because i watched it hover for a good 30 seconds and fumbled for my camera phone. it appeared "square" because of the lighting layout, inlike anything i have ever seen on an aircraft. all lights were brilliant white, no other colors were visible. i could not tell the size or distance but it has to have been within 1 mile, it looked to be hovering over the water retention area that is in my community. very unnerving sighting.
Summary: Object with 4 lights at corners and blinking light in middle hovering for 30-40sec then headed ESE
